title: China and Singapore Team Up to Allow Tourists to Spend Digital Yuan
description: Singapore and China have teamed up on a pilot to allow tourists in both countries to spend China’s central bank digital currency, the digital yuan. “This will enhance convenience for travelers when making purchases during their overseas travel,” Singapore’s central bank described. title: Two More Cases of Highly Pathogenic Avian Influenza Detected in South Korea
description: South Korea is grappling with the resurgence of highly pathogenic avian influenza (AI) as the government reports two new cases of the H5N1 strain at poultry farms. title: Avalanche Web Wallet to Undergo Transformation with Launch of Core on January 23
description: Kieran McShane, a prominent figure associated with Ava Labs’ products, has revealed significant developments regarding the widely-used Avalanche Web Wallet.
